altername_name: SD Gundam Sangoku Den: Brave Battle Warriors: Shin Militia Taisen
name: SD Gundam Sangokuden Brave Battle Warriors: Shin Mirisha Taisen
overview: SD Gundam Sangokuden Brave Battle Warriors: Shin Mirisha Taisen is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2010.
